==Abyssal Moon Spire==
===Floor 11===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**Your character will be periodically be inflicted with {{Color|Hydro|Slowing Water}}, greatly increasing your skills' CD duration until the inflicted Hydro element is removed.
**{{Color|Physical DMG}} dealt by all party members increased by 75%.
* '''Additional Details'''
** On Chamber 3's First Half, the Fatui Electro Cicin Mage is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}.

===Floor 12===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** For this floor only, the ley line flow will be normal.
** No Ley Line Disorder.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** Chamber 2's First Half has an {{Electro}} [[Elemental Node]].
** In Chamber 2's Second Half, the Hydro Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Hydro}} Aura which periodically spawns {{Color|Hydro|Mist Bubble}}. In addition, the Pyro Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Pyro|Smoldering Flames}}.
** In Chamber 3's Second Half, the Fatui Pyro Agent is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Pyro|Pursuing Fireball}}.
